name: Applied
slogan: Our platform helps teams hire the best candidate every time
description:
Our platform helps teams make more accurate (and less bias-prone) hiring decisions, and then continuously improve their hiring.

Where most hiring platforms address the issue of hiring more efficiently, our platform address the problem of how to hire better. At all stages of our product design process we've applied behavioural science to minimise cognitive biases such as by hiding potential bias triggers, and we've given priority to types of information that's strongly predictive of ability.

The result is that our customers see more diverse outcomes, and only have to interview roughly 1/3 of the candidates before finding someone great (compared to sifting through CVs)
